About Me

As a highly motivated and detail-oriented software developer, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise, creative problem-solving, and a strong passion for innovation. My journey in the tech industry began with a focus on Java development, where I honed my skills in designing and building efficient, scalable applications. Over time, I expanded my expertise to include modern technologies like React, Express.js, and MongoDB, enabling me to create full-stack solutions that deliver exceptional user experiences.


Driven by curiosity and a love for learning, I have delved into fields such as machine learning and convolutional neural networks, mastering tools like PyTorch and NumPy. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can contribute to challenging projects, collaborate with like-minded professionals, and grow both personally and professionally.

Experience

Republic of Singapore Air Force

Platoon 2nd In Charge - September 2022 - July 2023

Was the Platoon 2nd In Charge for 3rd Divisional Air Defence Artillery Battalion as a Full Lieutenant

  • Participate and lead a platoon in a tri-national exercise in Thailand, Exercise Cope Tiger
  • Was the Assistant Unit Corporate IT Officer and was in charge of the security and usability of IT devices
  • Held the role of Safety Officer for a number of exercises, from which I attained a Safety Award for mitigating incidents

Invade

Finance and HR Intern - August 2021 - January 2022

Participated in Human Resource and Finance related tasks

  • Emceed at a 3000 pax turnout event in Changi Airport with the Minister of Transport as the guest of honur
  • Conducted multiple recruitment interviews, including for managerial positions
  • Participated at events that the company held

The Number Crunchers Pte Ltd

Accounts Assistant Intern - October 2017 - March 2018

Performed bookkeeping and basic accountancy at a Public Accounting firm

  • Performed minor audting tasks
  • Helped lias and facilitate communications between clients
  • Performed on-site bookkeeping and accounting services for clients
